recent.title: Python's Quest for the Holy Grail of Readability
recent.excerpt: A look at how Python's emphasis on readability emerged from its ABC language roots, and why 'beautiful is better than ugly' became a guiding principle of the language.

recent.title: And Now for Something Completely Variable: Python's Naming Conventions
recent.excerpt: A practical guide to Python variable naming that won't have you pining for the fjords. Learn how clear naming and f-strings can make your code more readable than a Norwegian Blue parrot.

recent.title: Python Control Flow: And Now for Something Completely Logical
recent.excerpt: A practical guide to Python's control flow statements and functions, with a dash of Monty Python wisdom. Learn how to structure your code's decision-making without getting caught in the dreaded Infinite Loop of Caerbannog.
